Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

Capabilities.description: The capabilities data information for this domain.
Capabilities.longDescription: This type shall contain min and max that describe control capabilities of this domain.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Max.description: Maximal value of the controlled parameter for this domain. Value 0 means that either there are no constraints on the maximal value, or such constraints are unknown.
Max.longDescription: This property shall contain maximal value of the controlled parameter for this domain. Value 0 means that either there are no constraints on the maximal value, or such constraints are unknown (e.g. not reported by underlying hardware).

MaxCorrectionTimeInMs.description: Maximal correction time of policies in this domain.
MaxCorrectionTimeInMs.longDescription: This property shall contain maximal value correction time which can be set for policies in this domain.

MaxStatisticsReportingPeriod.description: Maximal statistic reporting period for calculating the average for policies in this domain. The value shall conform to the Duration format.
MaxStatisticsReportingPeriod.longDescription: This property shall contain maximal value correction time which can be set for policies in this domain. The value shall conform to the Duration format.

Min.description: Minimal value of the controlled parameter for this domain. Value 0 means that either there are no constraints on the minimal value, or such constraints are unknown.
Min.longDescription: This property shall contain minimal value of the controlled parameter for this domain. Value 0 means that either there are no constraints on the minimal value, or such constraints are unknown (e.g. not reported by underlying hardware).

MinCorrectionTimeInMs.description: Minimal correction time of policies in this domain.
MinCorrectionTimeInMs.longDescription: This property shall contain minimal value correction time which can be set for policies in this domain.

MinStatisticsReportingPeriod.description: Minimal statistic reporting period for calculating the average for policies in this domain. The value shall conform to the Duration format.
MinStatisticsReportingPeriod.longDescription: This property shall contain minimal value correction time which can be set for policies in this domain. The value shall conform to the Duration format.

State.description: The state of the Resource to transition to.
State.longDescription: This parameter shall contain the state of the Resource to transition to.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.
This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Max.description: Maximal value of the controlled parameter for this domain. Value 0 means that either there are no constraints on the maximal value, or such constraints are unknown.
Max.longDescription: This property shall contain maximal value of the controlled parameter for this domain. Value 0 means that either there are no constraints on the maximal value, or such constraints are unknown (e.g. not reported by underlying hardware).

Min.description: Minimal value of the controlled parameter for this domain. Value 0 means that either there are no constraints on the minimal value, or such constraints are unknown.
Min.longDescription: This property shall contain minimal value of the controlled parameter for this domain. Value 0 means that either there are no constraints on the minimal value, or such constraints are unknown (e.g. not reported by underlying hardware).

Name.description: Name of component for which capabilites are presented.
Name.longDescription: This property shall contain name of the domains component for which capabilites is for.

enumDescriptions.ProchotRatio: CPU ratio value to be set in response to PROCHOT# signal assertion.
enumDescriptions.TurboRatioLimit: Turbo ratio limit for all active threads and all CPU packages.

Domain.description: The NmDomain schema contains properties related to monitoring and control of the given domain.
Domain.longDescription: The NmDomain schema contains properties related to monitoring and control of the given domain.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this Resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this Resource.

Capabilities.description: The capabilities data information for this domain.
Capabilities.longDescription: This type shall contain min and max that describe control capabilities of this domain.

ComponentCapabilities.description: The capabilities data information for components in this domain.
ComponentCapabilities.longDescription: This type shall contain min and max that describe control capabilities for componenents of this domain.

ControlKnobs.description: Collection of Control Knobs supported for policies in this domain.
ControlKnobs.longDescription: This property shall contain collection of Control Knob values which are allowed for policies in this domain.

LimitBias.description: Limit Bias settings to apply to policies in a domain.
LimitBias.longDescription: This property shall contain values for Absolute and Relative Limit Bias which will be applied to limits of selected policies.

LimitingPolicies.description: Array of links to the policies that are currently enforcing power capping in this domain.
LimitingPolicies.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to the policies that are currently enforcing power capping in this domain.

LimitingPolicy.deprecated: This value has been deprecated in favor of LimitingPolicies collection.
LimitingPolicy.description: Link to the policy that is currently enforcing power capping in this domain.
LimitingPolicy.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a policy that is currently enforcing power capping in this domain.

Links.description: The links to other Resources that are related to this Resource.
Links.longDescription: This property shall contain links to Resources that are related to but are not contained by or subordinate to this Resource.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

Statistics.longDescription: This property shall contain statistics of a controlled parameter for the domain.

Status.description: The status and health of the Resource and its subordinate or dependent Resources.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the Resource.

SupportedTriggers.description: An array of links to triggers supported by this domain.
SupportedTriggers.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to triggers which can be used for policies in this domain.

LimitBias.description: Absolute and Relative Limit Bias Values.
LimitBias.longDescription: This type shall contain Absolute and Relative Limit Bias values.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AbsoluteLimitBias.longDescription: This property shall value of an Absolute Limit Bias.

RelativeLimitBias.longDescription: This property shall value of an Absolute Limit Bias.

Links.description: The links to other Resources that are related to this Resource.
Links.longDescription: This Redfish Specification-described type shall contain links to Resources that are related to but not contained by or subordinate to this Resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties contained in this object shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

Policies.description: An array of links to policies created in this domain.
Policies.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to policies created in this domain

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ResetStatistics.description: This ResetStatistics action forces the manager to reset statistics Minimal, Maximal and Average values for the domain.
ResetStatistics.longDescription: This ResetStatistics action forces the manager to reset statistics Minimal, Maximal and Average values for the domain.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Statistics.description: Min, max, average and current values of statistics.
Statistics.longDescription: This type shall contain min, max, average and current values statistics the resource it is used in.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Average.longDescription: This property shall contain an average value of collected statistics.

AveragingDuration.deprecated: This property has been deprecated in favor of AveragingInterval.
AveragingDuration.description: Duration over which average value was calculated.
AveragingDuration.longDescription: This property shall contain duration over which an average value was collected for these statistics. The value shall conform to the Duration format.

AveragingInterval.description: Interval over which average value was calculated.
AveragingInterval.longDescription: This property shall contain interval over which an average value was collected for these statistics. The value shall conform to the Duration format.

Current.longDescription: This property shall contain a current value of collected statistics.

Max.longDescription: This property shall contain a maximal value of collected statistics.

MeasurementState.description: Flag stating if the measuremt is in progress.
MeasurementState.longDescription: This property is a flag telling if the statistics measurement was at progress.

Min.longDescription: This property shall contain a minimal value of collected statistics.

Name.longDescription: This property shall contain the statistic name.

title: #NmDomain.v1_4_0.Domain
